name: Farm Frenzy 2
description: There's nothing wrong with indulging in a little "fowl play" when it's Farm Frenzy 2, the all-new sequel to the smash hit of 2007! The fun never stops as you grow grass, feed chickens, collect eggs and take your produce to market.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 1000 MHz CPUMemory: 256 MB RamGraphics: 16 MB Video CardDirectX®: 8Hard Drive: 41 MB of free space
